mapper.select: SELECT F.POST_NUMBER postNumber, F.TITLE title, M.NICKNAME writer, F.WRITE_DATE writeDate, F.VIEW_COUNT viewCount, F.REPLY_COUNT replyCount FROM FREE_BOARD F, MEMBER M WHERE F.WRITER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY postNumber DESC

SELECT F.POST_NUMBER postNumber, F.TITLE title, M.NICKNAME writer, F.CONTENT content, F.WRITE_DATE writeDate, F.VIEW_COUNT viewCount, F.REPLY_COUNT replyCount FROM FREE_BOARD F, MEMBER M WHERE F.WRITER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER AND F.POST_NUMBER = #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE_BOARD (TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT) VALUES (#{param1},#{param2},#{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NUMBER postNumber, TITLE title, CONTENT content FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE POST_NUMBER = #{param1}
